describe: Qatar is a small, wealthy nation located on the northeastern coast of the Arabian Peninsula. Known for its modern architecture, rich cultural heritage, and significant natural gas reserves, Qatar has rapidly developed into a major global player. The capital city, Doha, is a hub for international business and tourism, offering a blend of traditional and contemporary experiences.

cities.name: üèù Doha
cities.geographical_location: Located on the central east coast of the Qatar Peninsula, along the Persian Gulf.
cities.climate: Desert climate with extremely hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Machboos, a spiced rice dish with meat, and Harees, a traditional porridge.

cities.name: üèù Al Wakrah
cities.geographical_location: Situated just south of Doha along the eastern coast.
cities.climate: Desert climate with hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood dishes, reflecting its history as a fishing and pearling village.

cities.name: üèù Al Khor
cities.geographical_location: Located on the northeastern coast of Qatar, north of Doha.
cities.climate: Desert climate with hot summers and mild winters.
cities.famous_cuisine: Traditional Qatari dishes like Madrouba and Balaleet.
